languages.text: "Предатели в рядах Дома не смирятся так просто с {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}решением оставить Атлас{/d}. Тем более теперь, когда правду о его создании уже невозможно скрыть — все же навигаторы Орселлио связаны со мной, ну а я связана с ними". {n}Кассия касается нагрудника в области Атласа.{/n} "И все же я не оставлю попыток объединить Дом. Пока раскол истощает нас изнутри, представители прочих династий Навис Нобилите захотят разорвать нас на части. Но я им этого не позволю".

traits.locale_text: "Предатели в рядах Дома не смирятся так просто с решением оставить Атлас. Тем более теперь, когда правду о его создании уже невозможно скрыть — все же навигаторы Орселлио связаны со мной, ну а я связана с ними". {n}Кассия касается нагрудника в области Атласа.{/n} "И все же я не оставлю попыток объединить Дом. Пока раскол истощает нас изнутри, представители прочих династий Навис Нобилите захотят разорвать нас на части. Но я им этого не позволю".

languages.text: "Traitors within the House will not simply accept the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}decision to keep the Atlas{/d}. Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed — after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."
languages.original_text: "Предатели в рядах Дома не смирятся так просто с {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}решением оставить Атлас{/d}. Пока раскол истощает нас изнутри, представители прочих династий Навис Нобилите захотят разорвать нас на части. Но я им этого не позволю".

traits.locale_text: "Traitors within the House will not simply accept the decision to abandon the Atlas. Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed; after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."

Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed — after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."

languages.text: “家族中的叛徒不会简简单单地接受这个决定，{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}继续保留圣仪{/d}，尤其是再也没有人可以掩盖圣仪创造的真相。毕竟，奥赛罗家族的每位导航者都与我相连，我也与他们相连。”{n}卡西娅将手伸向胸甲，抚摸着嵌有圣仪的位置。{/n}“然而，我依然会努力将我的家族团结起来。这场内斗削弱了我们的力量，其他导航宗族可能会受到诱惑，打算趁此机会把我们彻底消灭，但我决不允许任何人这么做。”
languages.original_text: "Traitors within the House will not simply accept the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}decision to keep the Atlas{/d}. Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed — after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."

traits.locale_text: “家族中的叛徒不会简简单单地接受这个决定，放弃圣仪的力量，尤其是再也没有人可以掩盖圣仪创造的真相。毕竟，奥塞罗家族的每位导航者都与我相连，我也与他们相连。”{n}卡西娅将手伸向胸甲，抚摸着嵌有圣仪的位置。{/n}“然而，我依然会努力将我的家族团结起来。这场内斗削弱了我们的力量，其他导航宗族可能会受到诱惑，打算趁此机会把我们彻底消灭，但我决不允许任何人这么做。”

languages.original_text: "Traitors within the House will not simply accept the decision to abandon the Atlas. Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed — after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."

languages.text: «Los traidores de la casa no aceptarán la {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}decisión de conservar el Atlas{/d} sin más. Y menos ahora que la verdad sobre su creación ya no puede reprimirse. A fin de cuentas, cada Navegante de la casa Orsellio está vinculado a mí y yo a ellos». {n}Cassia se toca la coraza en el lugar que guarda el Atlas.{/n} «Sin embargo, no renunciaré a unificar mi casa. El conflicto interno nos debilitará y es posible que otras dinastías de la Navis Nobilite intenten hacernos pedazos, pero no se lo permitiré».
languages.original_text: "Traitors within the House will not simply accept the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}decision to keep the Atlas{/d}. Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed — after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."

traits.locale_text: «Los traidores de la casa no aceptarán la decisión de abandonar el Atlas sin más. Y menos ahora que la verdad sobre su creación ya no puede reprimirse. A fin de cuentas, cada Navegante de la casa Orsellio está vinculado a mí y yo a ellos». {n}Cassia se toca la coraza en el lugar que guarda el Atlas.{/n} «Sin embargo, no renunciaré a unificar mi casa. El conflicto interno nos debilitará y es posible que otras dinastías de la Navis Nobilite intenten hacernos pedazos, pero no se lo permitiré».

languages.text: 「一族の中の裏切り者たちは、{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}アトラスを維持するという決断{/d}を簡単に受け入れることはないでしょう。特に、その創造に関する真実がもはや抑制できなくなったとなればなおさらです…結局、オーセリオの航宙士は皆、私とつながりがあり、私は彼らとつながっているのです」{n}カシアはアトラスのある胸当てに触れる。{/n}「それでも私は、我が家を団結させることを諦めません。争いが私たちを内部から弱体化させ、他の航宙貴族のメンバーが私たちをバラバラに引き裂こうとする誘惑に駆られるかもしれません。ですが、私がそれを許しません」
languages.original_text: "Traitors within the House will not simply accept the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}decision to keep the Atlas{/d}. Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed — after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."

traits.locale_text: 「一族の中の裏切り者たちは、{d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}アトラスを維持するという決断{/d}を簡単に受け入れることはないでしょう。特に、その創造に関する真実がもはや抑制できなくなったとなればなおさらです…結局、オーセリオの航宙士は皆、私とつながりがあり、私は彼らとつながっているのです」{n}カシアはアトラスのある胸当てに触れる。{/n}「それでも私は、我が家を団結させることを諦めません。争いが私たちを内部から弱体化させ、他の航宙貴族のメンバーが私たちをバラバラに引き裂こうとする誘惑に駆られるかもしれません。ですが、私がそれを許しません」

languages.text: "Verräter im Haus werden die Entscheidung nicht einfach akzeptieren, {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}den Atlas zu behalten{/d}. Besonders nun, da die Wahrheit über seine Entstehung nicht länger unterdrückt werden kann. Schließlich hat jeder Orsellio-Navigator eine Verbindung zu mir und ich zu ihnen." {n}Cassia berührt ihre Brustplatte an der Stelle, an der sich der Atlas befindet.{/n} "Und doch werde ich nicht aufgeben, mein Haus zu vereinen zu versuchen. Wenn Zwist uns von innen heraus schwächt, könnten Mitglieder anderer Dynastien der Navis Nobilite versucht sein, uns in Stücke zu reißen. Doch das werde ich nicht zulassen."
languages.original_text: "Traitors within the House will not simply accept the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}decision to keep the Atlas{/d}. Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed — after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."

traits.locale_text: "Verräter im Haus werden die Entscheidung nicht einfach akzeptieren, den Atlas aufzugeben. Besonders nun, da die Wahrheit über seine Entstehung nicht länger unterdrückt werden kann. Schließlich hat jeder Orsellio-Navigator eine Verbindung zu mir und ich zu ihnen." {n}Cassia berührt ihre Brustplatte an der Stelle, an der sich der Atlas befindet.{/n} "Und doch werde ich nicht aufgeben, mein Haus zu vereinen zu versuchen. Wenn Zwist uns von innen heraus schwächt, könnten Mitglieder anderer Dynastien der Navis Nobilite versucht sein, uns in Stücke zu reißen. Doch das werde ich nicht zulassen."

"Verräter im Haus werden die Entscheidung nicht einfach akzeptieren, den Atlas zu behalten. Besonders nun, da die Wahrheit über seine Entstehung nicht länger unterdrückt werden kann. Schließlich hat jeder Orsellio-Navigator eine Verbindung zu mir und ich zu ihnen." {n}Cassia berührt ihre Brustplatte an der Stelle, an der sich der Atlas befindet.{/n} "Und doch werde ich nicht aufgeben, mein Haus zu vereinen zu versuchen. Wenn Zwist uns von innen heraus schwächt, könnten Mitglieder anderer Dynastien der Navis Nobilite versucht sein, uns in Stücke zu reißen. Doch das werde ich nicht zulassen."

languages.text: « Les traîtres au sein de ma maison ne vont pas simplement accepter de {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}garder l'Atlas{/d}, encore moins maintenant que la vérité concernant sa conception ne peut plus être gardée secrète. Après tout, les navigateurs des Orsellio sont tous interconnectés. » {n}Cassia pose la main sur son plastron, à l'endroit où se trouve l'Atlas.{/n} « Malgré tout, je ne cesserai jamais d'essayer d'unir ma maison. Cette querelle ne fait que nous affaiblir et les membres des autres dynasties de la Navis Nobilite pourraient être tentées de nous porter le coup de grâce, mais je ne les laisserai pas faire. »
languages.original_text: "Traitors within the House will not simply accept the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}decision to keep the Atlas{/d}. Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed — after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."

traits.locale_text: « Les traîtres au sein de ma maison ne vont pas simplement accepter d'abandonner l'Atlas, encore moins maintenant que la vérité concernant sa conception ne peut plus être gardée secrète. Après tout, les navigateurs des Orsellio sont tous interconnectés. » {n}Cassia pose la main sur son plastron, à l'endroit où se trouve l'Atlas.{/n} « Malgré tout, je ne cesserai jamais d'essayer d'unir ma maison. Cette querelle ne fait que nous affaiblir et les membres des autres dynasties de la Navis Nobilite pourraient être tentées de nous porter le coup de grâce, mais je ne les laisserai pas faire. »

languages.text: "Hane bünyesindeki hainler, {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}Atlas'tan feragat etmeme{/d} kararını öylece kabullenmeyecek. Bilhassa artık Atlas'ın yaratılışı hakkındaki gerçeği saklamak mümkün değilken... Sonuçta nasıl ki tüm Orsellio Rotacıları bana bağlıysa ben de onlara bağlıyım." {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın olduğu yere dokunuyor.{/n} "Yine de Hanemi bir araya getirme gayemden vazgeçmeyeceğim. Hane içinde verdiğimiz mücadele yüzünden güçsüz düştüğümüzde diğer Navis Nobilite hanedanlıkları bizi paramparça etmek isteyebilir. Bunu yapmalarına izin vermeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Traitors within the House will not simply accept the {d|Encyclopedia:CassiaQ2_SavedAtlas}decision to keep the Atlas{/d}. Especially now that the truth about its creation can no longer be suppressed — after all, every Orsellio Navigator has a connection to me, and I am connected to them." {n}Cassia touches her breastplate at the spot where the Atlas is located.{/n} "And yet I will not give up trying to unite my House. As strife weakens us from within, members of other Navis Nobilite dynasties may be tempted to tear us to pieces. But I will not allow them to do that."

traits.locale_text: "Hanenin bünyesindeki hainler, Atlas'tan feragat etmeme kararını öylece kabullenmeyecek. Bilhassa da artık Atlas'ın nasıl yaratıldığı hakkındaki gerçeği saklamak mümkün olmadığına göre... Sonuçta nasıl ki tüm Orsellio Rotacıları bana bağlıysa, ben de onlara bağlıyım." {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın olduğu yere dokunuyor.{/n} "Yine de Hanemi bir araya getirmeye çalışmaktan vazgeçmeyeceğim. Hane içinde verdiğimiz mücadele yüzünden güçsüz düştüğümüzde diğer Navis Nobilite hanedanlıkları bizi paramparça etmek isteyebilir. Bunu yapmalarına izin vermeyeceğim."
